Yousef Ourabi writes:
> Where are you??? Its 11 PST and St.Ack and Tree are
> still mointoring the list :) I am not ofcourse, this
> is an automated email really...

I'm on the East Coast of the US, and don't sleep much. :-)

> So about that box, I think it is a little unrealistic.
> Are the memory requirements of Heritrix exponential?

Not that I know of.

The experience I gave may should be qualified with:

- I was restoring a crawl from restore.gz when I ran out of memory in
  a 512MB heap. This may be the cause right there.

- This is on Mac OS X, an OS that has not been tested by the IA folks.
